docs.snippet: A Zimbabwean magistrate on Friday dismissed charges against former U.S. Rep. Mel Reynolds of possessing pornography, and he was ordered to pay a fine or face jail time after pleading guilty to charges of violating the country's immigration laws....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Zimbabwean magistrate on Friday dismissed charges against former U.S. Rep. Mel Reynolds of possessing pornography, and he was ordered to pay a fine or face jail time after pleading guilty to charges of violating the country's immigration laws.

headline.main: Zimbabwe Judge Dismisses Charge Against Ex-US Rep
headline.print_headline: Zimbabwe Judge Dismisses Charge Against Ex-US Rep

docs.snippet: An appeals court rejected an argument from Jean-Claude Duvalier, known as Baby Doc, that the statute of limitations had expired for the charge of crimes against humanity....
docs.lead_paragraph: An appeals court rejected an argument from Jean-Claude Duvalier, known as Baby Doc, that the statute of limitations had expired for the charge of crimes against humanity.
docs.abstract: Appeals court in Haiti rules that Jean-Claude Duvalier, one of country's most brutal dictators who was known as Baby Doc, can be charged with crimes against humanity; court stops short of ordering trial to proceed, calling instead for further investigation.

headline.main: Haitian Dictator May Be Charged With Human Rights Crimes, Court Says
headline.print_headline: Haitian Dictator May Be Charged With Human Rights Crimes, Court Says

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

docs.snippet: Detroit presented its first full road map for leaving bankruptcy Friday, outlining an elaborate plan to restructure $18 billion in debt, demolish thousands of blighted homes and invest in the broken-down infrastructure that has made the city a sym...
docs.lead_paragraph: Detroit presented its first full road map for leaving bankruptcy Friday, outlining an elaborate plan to restructure $18 billion in debt, demolish thousands of blighted homes and invest in the broken-down infrastructure that has made the city a symbol of urban decay.

headline.main: Detroit Draws First Map to Get Out of Bankruptcy
headline.print_headline: Detroit Draws First Map to Get Out of Bankruptcy
